text.div:
Blood Group Antibody Screen

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    14606-8 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Prewarmed
    15343-7 Blood group antibody screen [Titer] in Serum or Plasma
    30008-7 Blood group antibody screen [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Albumin technique
    32638-9 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Saline method
    46271-3 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma --after transfusion reaction
    75263-4 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by GEL
    75264-2 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Low ionic strength saline (LISS)
    75265-9 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Polyethylene glycol (PEG) method
    890-4 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma
    891-2 Blood group antibody screen.cell I [Presence] in Serum or Plasma
    892-0 Blood group antibody screen.cell III [Presence] in Serum or Plasma
    894-6 Blood group antibody screen.cell II [Presence] in Serum or Plasma
    895-3 Blood group antibody screen.cells I+II+III [Presence] in Serum or Plasma
    896-1 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Cold absorption
    897-9 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Elution
    898-7 Blood group antibody screen.cell I [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Prewarmed
    899-5 Blood group antibody screen.cell II [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Prewarmed
    900-1 Blood group antibody screen.cell III [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Prewarmed
    901-9 Blood group antibody screen.cells I+II+III [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Prewarmed
    903-5 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by RESt absorption
    904-3 Blood group antibody screen [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Warm absorption
